<BR></UL></P>

</H2>
</UL><UL>
<LI><H2>http://www-fp.mcs.anl.gov/~gregor/datorr
</H2>
</UL><UL>
<LI><H2>Oct 8-9 Meeting at Argonne and SC98 BoF
</H2>
</UL><UL>
<LI><H2>Feb 15-16 at Sandia Albuquerque
</H2>
</UL><UL>
<LI><H2>Collecting projects and abstracting requirements from user and system point of view
</H2>
</UL><UL>
<LI><H2>Aim is to suggest standards for client-middleware (what is a task?) and middleware-backend (what is a resource) 
</H2>
</UL><UL>
<LI><H2>Standards will be in XML so can use in your favorite object model
</H2>
</UL><UL>
<LI><H2>Common Portal Architecture initiative in NCSA alliance will drive DATORR with application requirements and (several) “workbench”/”Portal” implementations
</H2>
</UL><UL>
